title: I found a bug but I got punished for it...
body:
I tried to queue up with friends but when I hit accept, the pop up didn't disappear. So now I can hit accept or decline infinite number of time but it doesn't go away.

Even though me and my friends are in game, I have no way to pick/ban a champion because the pop up is blocking me.

So this results in a dodge, which blocks us from playing for 5 minutes. Why am I punished for this?

This is what I can see...:
https://i.imgur.com/lNLWw9J.png

https://i.imgur.com/1ewMwPH.png

replies.body: This is a known issue in the last few days
